name: Industrial Operation Technology Manager Northern Europe & CIS Countries
description:
Job Responsibilities:

● Develop and deploy the Industrial IT Operation Technology within the Geography (Russia and Kazakhstan);

● Support operational teams of the different affiliates within the Geography;

● Ensures that corporate cybersecurity rules are fulfilled and fully deployed in all Geography affiliates;

● Provides support, recommendations and basic methodology to Operations for safe, reliable and secure OT infrastructure, and best operational decisions;

● Analyzes the need for appropriate OT solutions to prevent potentially insecure local implementations;

● Support industrial OT applications which focus on measuring production and operational factors

● Generates analysis reports on cybersecurity incidents;

● Prepares alerts to report and capitalize on cybersecurity incidents;

● Supports complex and major MOCs which have impact on OT integrity and infrastructure.

General Requirements:

● Knowledgeable in this domain of competences;

● Show good knowledge of applicable engineering principles and processes, within the OT world.

● Experience in managing industrial issues.

Skill Set/Knowledge/Expertise:

● Strong knowledge in Industrial OT fundamentals used in industrial operations.

● Ability to identify problem situations within an appropriate time frame, develop several alternative solutions to problems, analyze situations and highlight important issues, suggest adequate, valuable and feasible solutions;

● Share knowledge and experience, cooperate and make self available, listen, gather information, take into consideration the needs, ideas, opinions of others;

● Initiate actions, ideas or solutions spontaneously on his own, undertake action without waiting directives, and use all of his/her resources before asking for help.

● Be able to manage human and organizational aspects related to OT.

● Effectively interact with other OT disciplines/organizations, business lines, plant operations and senior management. Interactions that will be made either by traveling to the various production sites, or by interacting through “remote” connections

● Ability to develop knowledge and expertise by mentoring, coaching and training.

● Strong leadership and organizational skills, effective at time management and able to multi-task with changing priorities.

● Must have good communication skills, written and oral. Also in English (fluently)

● Computer literacy – familiar with OT tools and related software.

Education and Experience:

● Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology plus ideally 5+ years process industry experience. Equivalent combination of education and experience are acceptable.
